channel.title: Help making chicken outfit equip to the right place
channel.description:
I am working on my next release of my source and right now I am working on making the new items from Silabs client being able to work. I updated my Item.Java file and I noticed or thought that the chicken outfit wasn't in the item.java file. I added the feet and re-compiled the server then logged in (As you do) but I wasn't able to equip the chicken feet instead it did nothing.
I don't know whats gone wrong I am using ChaosScape (My Server Source) which is packed a little different to other servers. But I can't equip it and I am wondering if someone could help me out because I've never needed to add new items to a server before.
Any help or ideas will be much appreciated.
-Cheers guys!

item.title: Help making chicken outfit equip to the right place
item.dc:creator: @EwfsPrince EwfsPrince
item.description:
@EwfsPrince wrote:

I am working on my next release of my source and right now I am working on making the new items from Silabs client being able to work. I updated my Item.Java file and I noticed or thought that the chicken outfit wasn’t in the item.java file. I added the feet and re-compiled the server then logged in (As you do) but I wasn’t able to equip the chicken feet instead it did nothing.

I don’t know whats gone wrong I am using ChaosScape (My Server Source) which is packed a little different to other servers. But I can’t equip it and I am wondering if someone could help me out because I’ve never needed to add new items to a server before.

Any help or ideas will be much appreciated.
